mapper.select: SELECT t.transaction_id AS tx_id, t.client_id, t.transaction_amount, c.industry, c.expected_recovery_days FROM `transaction` t JOIN `client` c ON t.client_id = c.client_id LEFT JOIN prediction_risk pr ON pr.tx_id = t.transaction_id WHERE ( t.recovered_date IS NULL OR DATE(t.recovered_date) > DATE(t.expected_payment_date) ) AND DATE(t.expected_payment_date) <= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 1 DAY) group by t.transaction_id -- AND pr.tx_id IS NULL
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO prediction_risk ( client_id, tx_id, predicted_delay, risk_level, comment, created_at, updated_at ) VALUES ( #{clientId}, #{txId}, #{predictedDelay}, #{riskLevel}, #{comment}, NOW(), NOW() )
mapper.select: SELECT pr.created_at, MAX(c.name) AS name, MAX(pr.client_id) AS client_id, pr.tx_id, MAX(pr.predicted_delay) AS predicted_delay, MAX(t.transaction_date) AS transaction_date, MAX(t.transaction_amount) AS transaction_amount, MAX(t.recovered_amount) AS recovered_amount, DATEDIFF(MAX(t.recovered_date), MAX(t.expected_payment_date)) AS real_delay, ABS(DATEDIFF(MAX(t.recovered_date), MAX(t.expected_payment_date)) - MAX(pr.predicted_delay)) AS abs_error, MAX(pr.risk_level) AS risk_level, MAX(pr.comment) AS comment FROM prediction_risk pr INNER JOIN ( SELECT tx_id, client_id, DATE(created_at) AS created_date, MAX(created_at) AS latest_created_at FROM prediction_risk WHERE DATE(created_at) BETWEEN DATE_SUB(#{yesterday}, INTERVAL 6 DAY) AND #{yesterday} GROUP BY tx_id, client_id, DATE(created_at) ) latest ON pr.tx_id = latest.tx_id AND pr.client_id = latest.client_id AND DATE(pr.created_at) = latest.created_date AND pr.created_at = latest.latest_created_at INNER JOIN `transaction` t ON t.transaction_id = pr.tx_id AND t.client_id = pr.client_id INNER JOIN client c ON c.client_id = t.client_id WHERE ( t.recovered_date IS NULL OR pr.created_at < t.recovered_date ) GROUP BY pr.tx_id, pr.created_at ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
